properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 2:13PM PST until February 12 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

.IN THE MAIN CHANNEL...

- GENERAL SEAS...7 to 9 ft through Wednesday.

- FIRST EBB...Very strong around 630 PM Tuesday. Seas to 15 ft
with breakers possible.

- SECOND EBB...Around 7 AM Wednesday. Seas to 12 ft.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon
to 9 PM PST this evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 5
AM to 9 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft especially
when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY
